attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: TO MAKE THE M1 ROAD WIDENING FOR ALL DRIVERS,NOT JUST FOR CAR SHARING THIS IS TOTALLY UNFAIR

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be a call to action, not your name. Also, please resubmit without using BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult for people to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
